2.text: Read the conversation and answer the questions. 1. A. Who is absent? B. Why is she absent? 2. Find a term similar in meaning to the following words: stale, contaminated, unpasteurized, ill 3. Discuss with your partner. • How can we prevent food poisoning? 4. Read the above conversation and find the sentences used to: i. give advice iii. ask permission ii. express willingness iv. to advise or to warn Activity 3

3.text: Complete these sentences using “must, should, would or can.” 1. All students ………………………. eat healthy food. 2. We …………………………. keep our class nice and clean. 3. …………………… you like another piece of cake? 4. You look tired. ………………. I make you a cup of tea?

6.text: Suganya’s friends have made a Get Well card for her. Read it. Imagine you are Suganya and write a note to your classmates thanking them for their concern.

7.text: Dear Suganya, We are sorry to hear that you are not well. Please take care and get well soon!
